DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , multi-center study evaluate effectiveness safety three different dos topiramate ( 50mg , 100mg , 200mg daily ) migraine prophylaxis . The study consist five phase : baseline ( determination whether patient meet eligibility criterion taper migraine medication patient already take ) ; initial titration double-blind phase ( 8 week ) begin 25 mg/daily increase assign ( 50 , 100 , 200 mg/day topiramate ) ; follow maintenance period target dose ( 18 week ) ; taper transition phase ( 7 week ) ; open-label extension 6 month ( maximum topiramate dose 1600 mg/day ) ; dos adjust maximize effectiveness minimize side effect . The primary study hypothesis one three dos topiramate ( 50 , 100 , 200 mg/day ) superior placebo prophylaxis migraine base change monthly ( 28 day ) migraine period rate prospective baseline period double-blind phase topiramate treatment well tolerate . During titration period ( 8 week ) , dose increase target dose daily topiramate ( 50 milligram [ mg ] , 100 , 200mg ) placebo , take twice daily mouth . Doses continued 18 week , adjust 7 week , continue 6 month Open-Label Extension .
